algebraic_word_problem: A man is 4 times as old as his son. In 10 years, he will be twice as old as his son. How old are they now?
step_by_step_solution: Let son's age = x. Father's age = 4x. In 10 years: 4x + 10 = 2(x + 10). Solving gives 4x + 10 = 2x + 20; thus, 2x = 10, so x = 5. Father is 20 and son is 5.
